item.title: Start Journey for a modern application development
item.description: The technology landscape for developers is changing rapidly. From monolith applications to microservices, from an application deployed on-premise datacenter to cloud platform, also applications deployed on virtualized machines to the containerized environment, the shift is huge. As a developer, it is important to keep up to date with this changing landscape both upgrading oneself as well as looking for a new job. As there are a plethora of technologies and there are always much hype and evangelism around a new technology it is always good to start with a much stable language, framework, and tool.
